    • Method Detail

      • validateCoupon

        public void validateCoupon(Coupon coupon,
                           int id,
                           java.lang.String status)
                    throws CustomValidationExepation,
                           CustomDateBaseExepation

        Validate Coupon

        A method that validates a coupon in two situations :
        1) when the "Status" is create -
        will check if title is available, will check if this company already has this coupon , will check if the start date is a valid date , will check if end date is a valid date.
        2) when the "Status" is ownership -
        will check if there is a coupon with this title , will check if this coupon belongs to this company , will check if the endDate is a valid date.
        Parameters:
        coupon - - (Coupon)
        id - - company ID (int)
        status - - (String)
        Throws:
        CustomValidationExepation - - in case on of the parameters is not valid.
        CustomDateBaseExepation - - in case this coupon already exist or do not belong to this company .

      • validatCompany

        public void validatCompany(Company company,
                           java.lang.String status)
                    throws CustomDateBaseExepation

        Validate Company

        A method that validates a company in two situations :
        1) when the "Status" is create -
        will check if this company exist .
        2) when the "Status" is update -
        will check if this company do not exist
        Parameters:
        company - - (Comapany)
        status - - (String)
        Throws:
        CustomDateBaseExepation - - in the first case company already exist and in the second case it do not.

      • validatCustomer

        public void validatCustomer(Customer customer,
                            java.lang.String status)
                     throws CustomDateBaseExepation

        Validate Customer

        A method that validates a customer in two situations :
        1) when the "Status" is create -
        will check if this customer exist .
        2) when the "Status" is update -
        will check if this customer do not exist .
        Parameters:
        customer - - (Customer)
        status - - (String)
        Throws:
        CustomDateBaseExepation - - in the first case customer already exist and in the second case it do not.
